cab.content: 279S EC RE T. OPERATIONS,From. General Hanbury Williams, G,H.Q,, Russia, .To C.I.G.S. * 13.4AL7,.967,'As statements have been made in the Press quoting telegram to me from Emperor, I merely state for your information that I received no such telegram,but if Press is correct it it as of a perfectly harmless nature,, and referred to his health and that of his children, .
